name: Add new Gravity Forms entries as rows in Microsoft Excel
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically transferring new entries from Gravity Forms to Microsoft Excel. With this template, every time a new form submission is received in Gravity Forms, Make will seamlessly add a new row to your Excel worksheet, ensuring your data is organized and easily accessible for analysis. This integration eliminates manual data entry, saving you time and reducing the risk of errors. Perfect for managing responses, feedback, or any other data collected through your forms.
